评论概述: Great Boho Style - inside dress shell too thin
评论详情: Love-The Style and Length Dislike - inside dress shell too thin otherwise it would be a 5 star review Purchased Size Small for a gift and she loves it She is 5’ Tall and weighing 90 lbs

I really loved the look of the 3/4 sleeve dress. I went by the size chart... XL fits 40" chest, I'm a 38. Well, that little zipper they show in the picture is useless. It's about 4" and doesn't connect to an opening. So it's a slip over your head dress. The waistline has no stretch. I don't know about others, but my bust size is bigger than my waist size. I tried to get it on over my head, but couldn't get the waistline over my bust. I returned. So, if your bust is bigger than your waistline, I'd think twice about ordering the 3/4 sleeve. It's cute, but impossible to get on.

1 star only because the sizing is sooo off. I ordered this dress four times! I wear size small, 4–6. With the small, medium and large I could not get the side zipper up. I now have an XL! Will have to have it taken in. Wouldn’t have gone through all this trouble if the dress wasn’t so beautiful 😍 just beware of the sizing
The dress arrived today. It definitely does not look as detailed as shown in the picture. Sizing is incorrect as well. I ordered an xl, received a large & it’s a lil bit big.

The dress is gorgeous and it fit... except for the top... ladies with a large bust. This dress isn't for us. Being a DD cup I'm spilling out of this dress front and sides. It just covers the nips. I'm saddened bc the dress is gorgeous and the material is soft but the top leaves nothing to the imagination. One wrong move or sneeze and the girls are out!

I am a DD chest and ordered an XL after I received an L that sat on top of my boobs but did not conform under with the waist line without hanging out a bunch. I received the XL thinking it would be larger in the chest. Nope it was actually smaller. So either I got a mislabeled dress or this is so heavily mass produced that they don’t actually have different sizes. It is a really cute dress but I am not trying to fall out of it.

First, the pictures shows a long slip and an uneven sheer overlay. What I got was a slip that was about 6 inches above my knee and a straight sheer part. Not what I wanted at all. And the top part... did not fit my 36DDs at all. I was busting out the top and the sheer "waist" part was showing the bottom half of my boobs! Sadly, I am returning it. It did appear to be well made.
Gorgeous cotton dress, bright white, true to size. I am 5”2 and 152 lbs. ordered size L. Not very long, can wear with flats or heals. Very feminine, so many compliments. Thank you, Amazon!!
What you see is what you get, sizing is accurate and the material is decent quality. Will purchase again, maybe try other colors
